SELECT D1.AUD_YR ,D1.DSP_RQ_KND_CD ,F_CODE_NM('1000738',D1.DSP_RQ_KND_CD) AS DSP_RQ_KND_NM ,D1.RPST_ORG_CD ,D2.RPST_ORG_NM ,D1.SUM_NOP_CNT ,D1.SUM_AM ,D1.SUM_CNT FROM TBBADEAR031M D1 ,TBBADEAR033M D2 WHERE 1=1 AND D1.RPST_ORG_CD = D2.RPST_ORG_CD
AND D1.AUD_YR = #strAUD_YR#
AND D2.RPST_ORG_NM LIKE '%'||#strRPST_ORG_NM#||'%'
ORDER BY D1.AUD_YR DESC, D1.RPST_ORG_CD DESC, D1.DSP_RQ_KND_CD DESC
